title: Profile
text:
Expertise

MICE and incomplete-data methodology

D-score for early child development

JAMES: Joint Automatic Measurement and Evaluation System

R package development

title: Profile
text:
Interests

MICE
Inventor of the MICE algorithm for multiple imputation of missing data, a widely used framework for handling incomplete datasets. My work focuses on advancing the methodology, improving practical implementations, and broadening its scope of applications.
Child Growth and Development
Developer of growth charts for the Dutch child health care system and creator of the D-score, a quantitative metric for early child development. I collaborate with the World Health Organization, the Gates Foundation, and numerous academic and global-health partners to promote evidence-based developmental assessment worldwide.
JAMES
Lead developer of JAMES, an integrated software system for automated measurement and evaluation of individual growth and development. JAMES includes modules for growth charts, D-scores, and next-generation developmental charts.
R Packages
Author and maintainer of several widely used R packages, including

mice for multiple imputation

dscore for computing D-scores

james for implementing the JAMES framework

I am also the founder of the GitHub organizations amices, D-score and growthcharts supporting open and reproducible research in statistical methodology and child development.
